segments.text: From my view, the kitchen has that homey feel with cabinets and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing a dish, concentrated on the task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I see the sink flooding over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor, pooling around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear or feel it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes on the counter seem untouched by the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the children: the boy on the precarious stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her treat, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sneaky cookie heist could go wrong so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a calm garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's peaceful out there, unlike the hazards building up inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm getting anxious just watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to call out before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
